page.title: 07Panfield Hall - Rachel
page.content: One Sunday morning we went to visit{Mr}and{Mrs Newman}at{Panfield {Hall.}The main hall was originally a hospital for the{Priory.}It was built away from the{Priory}because of the danger of infection spreading. It was orginally an 'E' shaped building without the centre piece but at some time the ends were sliced off. On an outside wall there is a door frame between the ground and first floor level. It is impossible to tell why. In a passage there is a piece of original carved wood. There is a rumour of a tunnel leading from the Hall to the church.There is said to be the ghost of a monk in the tunnel. I have some ducks and the female hatched some eggs out. When the ducklings had grown up we gave five to {Mr and Mrs Newman}for their pond.
